name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v2

    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v2
      with:
        python-version: '3.8'
    
    - name: Venv environment
      run: |
        python -m venv venv
        source venv/bin/activate
    
    - name: Run tests
      run: |
        python -m unittest discover -s test -p "test_*.py"
